name: Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookie Bars
description: These vegan chocolate chip cookie bars are soft, chewy, thick and so easy to make. Easier than making cookies!

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a 8 or 9 inch square baking pan with parchment paper, leaving overhang on the sides for easy removal.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a 8 or 9 inch square baking pan with parchment paper, leaving overhang on the sides for easy removal.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, stir the ground flaxseeds and water and let it sit for a few minutes. This is your flax egg.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, stir the ground flaxseeds and water and let it sit for a few minutes. This is your flax egg.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk the melted vegan butter with the brown and granulated sugars until smooth. Now add in the flax egg and vanilla and stir with a large spoon to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, whisk the melted vegan butter with the brown and granulated sugars until smooth. Now add in the flax egg and vanilla and stir with a large spoon to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: To the bowl with the wet butter/sugar mixture, add the flour, cornstarch, baking soda, salt and stir until combined. The dough should be thick and soft.
recipeInstructions.name: To the bowl with the wet butter/sugar mixture, add the flour, cornstarch, baking soda, salt and stir until combined. The dough should be thick and soft.

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in almost all of the chocolate chips, saving some for the top.
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in almost all of the chocolate chips, saving some for the top.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to the prepared pan and press it down evenly. Sprinkle with more chocolate chips if desired, and bake for 30-32 minutes until lightly golden on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer to the prepared pan and press it down evenly. Sprinkle with more chocolate chips if desired, and bake for 30-32 minutes until lightly golden on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Let cool in the pan for 15-20 minutes, then lift the parchment paper out of the pan and cut into squares. Will keep in an airtight container for about a week. Can be frozen as well. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Let cool in the pan for 15-20 minutes, then lift the parchment paper out of the pan and cut into squares. Will keep in an airtight container for about a week. Can be frozen as well. Enjoy!

keywords: healthy vegan desserts, vegan chocolate chip cookie bars
